content: The National Science Foundation (NSF) is seeking public input from the science and engineering research and education community on implementing NSF Public Access Plan 2.0. Ensuring Open, Immediate and Equitable Access to National Science Foundation Funded Research. Here is the link to the Federal Register for the Request For Information (RFI) and the direct link to the Survey Monkey where you can provide your input. The survey closes at 11:59 p.m. (EST) on January 2, 2024.
